price: Ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe níṣẹ́ kò sì rọ̀ wọ́n lọ́rọ̀ (níbi ìyà).
arabic: فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: famā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūna
